author: Pavan Dahat
text: The police are taking a “sort of revenge” against Prabhat Singh for his impartial reporting from the conflict-torn Bastar region, his lawyer said on Wednesday. “Every case against him, is manufactured. The cases were slapped on him to stop him from reporting against the police. An effort was made [by the police] to reach a compromise with him. But when the attempt failed, theyarrested him,” lawyer Kishor Narayan told The Hindu .
title: False cases, says lawyer
